misc: The phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest' was named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event
biography: Okko, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his resilient spirit and unwavering determination on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Okko has been a consistent presence in past Hector Trophée tournaments, and 2025 will mark his fifth appearance.

Though the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Okko secured one Hector Trophée victory, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure and contribute effectively to a winning pair. A somewhat private person, Okko is known to be stoic and disciplined, meticulously planning each shot and approaching the game with a strategic mindset.

Off the course, however, Okko is known to be more jovial. In fact, one might even say that his jovial nature has gotten the better of him in the past. There is even a phenomenon called 'Okkotoberfest', named after his alcohol-induced condition in a past Hector event.

Despite battling back problems throughout his career, Okko remains a formidable competitor. His dedication to the sport and his ability to overcome adversity make him a respected figure among his peers. Okko's experience and perseverance will undoubtedly make him a player to watch in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
